i1.name: Determination
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Xin Zhao''' gains a ''Determination I'' and ''Determination II'' stack for every {{ai|Wind Becomes Lightning|Xin Zhao}} strike or basic attack [[on-hit]], up to a maximum of two.

At two ''Determination I'' stacks, '''Xin Zhao's''' next {{ai|Wind Becomes Lightning|Xin Zhao}} strike or basic attack [[on-hit]] consumes the stacks to {{tip|heal}} him for {{passive progression/deprecated version|10 to 112}} {{as|(+ 10% AD)}} {{as|(+ 40% AP)}}.

At two ''Determination II'' stacks, '''Xin Zhao's''' next {{ai|Wind Becomes Lightning|Xin Zhao}} strike or basic attack [[on-attack]] consumes the stacks to deal {{as|{{passive progression/deprecated version|4|key=%|15 to 45|1 to 16|displayformula=15%+10% every 5 levels}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.
i1.notes:
* Applies {{tip|proc damage}} via basic attack through two ''Determination II'' stacks.
* The ''Determination II'' stacks are not visible on the champion's buff bar in-game.
* Hitting one or more enemies with {{ai|Wind Becomes Lightning|Xin Zhao}} applies one stack per strike. The bonus damage applies to all enemies of one strike, but the healing only once.
* If {{ii|Guinsoo's Rageblade}} would trigger when the ''Determination II'' stacks are at maximum, the bonus stack will instead overstack, and be consumed on the next ''Determination II'' usage.
* {{Pending for test}}: ''Determination's'' interaction with ''parrying'' effects ({{tip|dodge}}, {{tip|block}}, {{tip|blind}}).

q1.name: Three Talon Strike
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Xin Zhao''' empowers his spear for 5 seconds, causing his next three basic attacks [[on-attack]] to become {{tip|unstoppable basic attack|unstoppable}}, deal {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} and reduce '''Xin Zhao's''' other [[Champion ability|abilities']] {{sti|cooldowns}} by 1 second each, as well as refresh ''Three Talon's Strike'' duration.
The third basic attack {{tip|airborne|knocks up}} the target for {{fd|0.75}} seconds and consumes the buff.
''Three Talon Strike'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Xin Zhao's''' basic attack timer and is affected by {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Physical Damage|{{ap|20 to 52}} {{as|(+ 40% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Bonus Damage|{{ap|20*3 to 52*3}} {{as|(+ 120% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
q1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will only block the third attack.
* The enhanced attacks present input buffering during their wind-up animation ('''Xin Zhao''' cannot be issued any commands until after it ends).

effects.levelingtext: {{st|Bonus Physical Damage|{{ap|20 to 52}} {{as|(+ 40% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Bonus Damage|{{ap|20*3 to 52*3}} {{as|(+ 120% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
effects.str:
• Bonus Physical Damage: (+ 40% bonus AD)
  • Total Bonus Damage: (+ 120% bonus AD)

w1.name: Wind Becomes Lightning
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Xin Zhao''' performs two strikes in the target direction and delays the durations of his other abilities relative to ''Wind Becomes Lightning's'' cast time after {{fd|0.2}} seconds of the activation.
The first deals {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies in an arc, and the second deals {{as|physical damage}} in a line, {{tip|slow|slowing}} all enemies hit by 50% for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
Both strikes deal 50% reduced damage against {{tip|minion|minions}}, benefit from {{fd|33.{{recurring|3}}}}% of '''Xin Zhao's''' {{stil|life steal}}.
leveling: {{st|Slash Damage|{{ap|30 to 70}} {{as|(+ 30% AD)}}|Slash Minion-Damage|{{ap|30/2 to 70/2}} {{as|(+ 15% AD)}}}}
{{st|Thrust Damage|{{ap|40 to 180}} {{as|(+ 80% AD)}}|Thrust Minion-Damage|{{ap|40/2 to 180/2}} {{as|(+ 40% AD)}}}}
{{st|Max. Physical Damage|{{ap|30+40 to 70+180}} {{as|(+ 110% AD)}}|Max. Minion Damage|{{ap|(30+40)/2 to (70+180)/2}} {{as|(+ 55% AD)}}}}
w1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block only a single instance of damage - either the thrust or the slash.
* ''Wind Becomes Lightning's'' first strike will always cast from the original casting position, whereas the second strike will cast from wherever '''Xin Zhao''' is at the end of the cast time.

effects.levelingtext: {{st|Slash Damage|{{ap|30 to 70}} {{as|(+ 30% AD)}}|Slash Minion-Damage|{{ap|30/2 to 70/2}} {{as|(+ 15% AD)}}}}
effects.str:
• Slash Damage: (+ 30% AD)
  • Slash Minion-Damage: (+ 15% AD)

effects.levelingtext: {{st|Thrust Damage|{{ap|40 to 180}} {{as|(+ 80% AD)}}|Thrust Minion-Damage|{{ap|40/2 to 180/2}} {{as|(+ 40% AD)}}}}
effects.str:
• Thrust Damage: (+ 80% AD)
  • Thrust Minion-Damage: (+ 40% AD)

effects.levelingtext: {{st|Max. Physical Damage|{{ap|30+40 to 70+180}} {{as|(+ 110% AD)}}|Max. Minion Damage|{{ap|(30+40)/2 to (70+180)/2}} {{as|(+ 55% AD)}}}}
effects.str:

  • Max. Minion Damage: (+ 55% AD)

e1.name: Audacious Charge
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Xin Zhao''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target enemy's location, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies around the primary target and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 30% for {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
'''Xin Zhao''' then gains {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 5 seconds.

'''Xin Zhao''' cannot cast {{ai|Wind Becomes Lightning|Xin Zhao}} while dashing, but he may still buffer it. {{ai|Three Talon Strike|Xin Zhao}} and {{ai|Crescent Guard|Xin Zhao}} can both be cast during the dash.
e1.notes:
* The primary target cannot dodge ''Audacious Charge's'' effects.
** The target will always emit the area of effect from their position.

r1.name: Crescent Guard
description: {{sbc|Passive - Challenge:}} The last enemy champion hit by '''Xin Zhao's''' [[basic attack]]s or {{ai|Audacious Charge|Xin Zhao}} is ''{{ai|Challenge|Xin Zhao|Challenged}}'' for 3 seconds.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Xin Zhao''' sweeps his spear around him, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies hit, capped at 600 {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}} against {{tip|monsters}}, while also {{tip|airborne|knocking back}} all non-''{{ai|Challenge|Xin Zhao|Challenged}}'' enemies hit.

For the next 3 seconds, '''Xin Zhao''' is {{tip|invulnerability|invulnerable}} to enemy {{tip|champion|champions}} more than 450-units away from him. His [[basic attack]]s and other [[champion ability|ability casts]] extend the duration by {{fd|0.3}} seconds.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|75 to 275}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 15% of target's '''current''' health)}}}}
r1.notes:
* {{tip|Pet|Pets}}, {{tip|stealthed trap|traps}}, [[ground-targeted|ground]] [[area of effect|AoEs]], {{tip|damage over time|DoTs}}, and delayed-damage skills (i.e - {{ai|Death Mark|Zed}}) will not damage '''Xin Zhao''' if the enemy champion source is outside the circle when the damage applies.
* ''Crescent Guard'' will cast from wherever '''Xin Zhao''' is at the end of the cast time.

effects.levelingtext: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|75 to 275}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 15% of target's '''current''' health)}}}}
effects.str: • Physical Damage: (+ 100% bonus AD) (+ 15% of target's current health)
